trans-unit.source: Provides a menu system for a form.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um sistema de menus para um formulário.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> is the top-level container that supersedes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> é o contêiner de nível superior que substitui <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.

trans-unit.source: It also provides key handling and multiple document interface (MDI) features.
trans-unit.target: Ele também oferece os recursos de manipulação de chaves e MDI (interface de múltiplos documentos).

trans-unit.source: Functionally, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> work along with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, although they are derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: Funcionalmente, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> trabalho junto com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, embora eles são derivados da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: Os itens a seguir foram especificamente projetados para funcionar perfeitamente com ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> em todas as orientações.

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> control:
trans-unit.target: Eles estão disponíveis por padrão em tempo de design para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controle:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> control represents the container for the menu structure of a form.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controle representa o contêiner para a estrutura de menu de um formulário.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> that represent the individual menu commands in the menu structure.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> objetos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> que representam os comandos de menu individuais na estrutura do menu.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> can be a command for your application or a parent menu for other submenu items.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> pode ser um comando para seu aplicativo ou o menu pai para outros itens de submenu.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> substitua e adicione funcionalidade ao controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> de versões anteriores, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e uso futuro, se desejado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> in a multiple-document interface (MDI) scenario.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> em um cenário de interface de documentos múltiplos (MDI).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> to which you can add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> para que você pode adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> supports overflow functionality.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> dá suporte à funcionalidade de estouro.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> supports overflow functionality; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> dá suporte à funcionalidade de estouro; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The overflow feature moves menu items to a drop-down menu when there is not enough room to display them in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: O recurso de estouro move itens de menu a um menu suspenso quando não há espaço suficiente para exibi-los em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>.

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.CanOverflow%2A> property to `true`, you must also enable overflow for specific menu items by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Overflow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.CanOverflow%2A> propriedade `true`, você também deve habilitar o estouro de itens de menu específicos definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Overflow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: By default, menu items are not displayed if they cannot fit within the available space.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, os itens de menu não são exibidos se eles não podem se ajustar dentro do espaço disponível.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o controle.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> para o controle.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se você não chamar explicitamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método, ele será chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade é referenciada.

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Para obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, você deve adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assembly instalado com o .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For a code example of using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código de uso <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The text to use for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser usado para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <c>text</c> parameter is a hyphen (-), this method creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" />.
trans-unit.target: Se o parâmetro <c>text</c> for um hífen (-), esse método criará um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos que aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> recebe um clique.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> with the specified text, image, and event handler on a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> com o texto, a imagem e o manipulador de eventos especificados em um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.#ctor(System.String,System.Drawing.Image,System.EventHandler)" />, or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" /> if the <paramref name="text" /> parameter is a hyphen (-).
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.#ctor(System.String,System.Drawing.Image,System.EventHandler)" /> ou um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" /> se o parâmetro <paramref name="text" /> for um hífen (-).

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.CreateDefaultItem%2A> method to add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> with commonly used characteristics to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.CreateDefaultItem%2A> método para adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> com comumente usado características para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default spacing, in pixels, between the sizing grip and the edges of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento padrão, em pixels, entre a alça de dimensionamento e as bordas do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> values representing the spacing, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> valores que representa o espaçamento, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Gets the spacing, in pixels, between the left, right, top, and bottom edges of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> from the edges of the form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento, em pixels, entre as bordas esquerda, direita, superior e inferior do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> e as bordas do formulário.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the spacing.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que representa o espaçamento.

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>{Left=6, Top=2, Right=0, Bottom=2}</c>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <c>{esquerda = 6, Top = 2, direito = 0, inferior = 2}</c>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.DefaultPadding%2A> property to set the interior space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.DefaultPadding%2A> propriedade para definir o espaçamento interior entre controles.

trans-unit.source: When a control is a container of items, padding represents the space from the edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controle é um contêiner de itens, o preenchimento representa o espaço da borda do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> by default.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as dicas de ferramenta são mostradas para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> por padrão.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.DefaultShowItemToolTips%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property always returns `false` because typically, ToolTips are not used for menus or menu items.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.DefaultShowItemToolTips%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade sempre retorna `false` porque, normalmente, as dicas de ferramenta não são usadas para menus ou itens de menu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal and vertical dimensions, in pixels, of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> when it is first created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as dimensões horizontal e vertical, em pixels, do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> quando ele é criado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Point.#ctor(System.Drawing.Size)" /> value representing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> horizontal and vertical dimensions, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Point.#ctor(System.Drawing.Size)" /> valor que representa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> dimensões horizontais e verticais, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The default is 200 x 21 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 21 x 200 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visibility of the grip used to reposition the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a visibilidade da alça usada para reposicionar o controle.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle.Hidden" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle.Hidden" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> that is used to display a list of Multiple-document interface (MDI) child forms.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> usado para exibir uma lista de formulários filho da interface MDI.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> that represents the menu item displaying a list of MDI child forms that are open in the application.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> que representa o item de menu que exibe uma lista dos formulários filho MDI abertos no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MdiWindowListItem%2A> property to designate or discover which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> displays MDI children.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MdiWindowListItem%2A> propriedade designar ou descobrir qual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> exibe filhos MDI.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate> events on child menus to reflect changes to the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MdiWindowListItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate> eventos nos menus filho para refletir as alterações para o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MdiWindowListItem%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MdiWindowListItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MdiWindowListItem%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user accesses the menu with the keyboard or mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário acessa o menu com o teclado ou mouse.

trans-unit.source: When activated by the ALT key, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> typically neither take nor remove the focus from the control that currently has the focus.
trans-unit.target: Quando ativado, a tecla ALT, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> normalmente não levar nem remover o foco do controle que tem o foco no momento.

trans-unit.source: If there is a control hosted within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> or a drop-down of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, the control gains focus when the user presses the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Se houver um controle hospedado dentro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> ou uma lista suspensa do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o controle obtém foco quando o usuário pressiona a tecla TAB.

trans-unit.source: In general, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> might not be raised when they are activated by the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> eventos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> não pode ser gerado quando são ativados por teclado.

trans-unit.source: In such cases, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate> events instead.
trans-unit.target: Nesses casos, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate> eventos em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> named `MenuStrip1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> chamado `MenuStrip1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate> evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> is deactivated.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> é desativada.

trans-unit.source: When activated by the ALT key, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> typically neither take nor remove the focus from the control that currently has the focus.
trans-unit.target: Quando ativado, a tecla ALT, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> normalmente não levar nem remover o foco do controle que tem o foco no momento.

trans-unit.source: If there is a control hosted within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> or a drop-down of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, the control gains focus when the user presses the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Se houver um controle hospedado dentro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> ou uma lista suspensa do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o controle obtém foco quando o usuário pressiona a tecla TAB.

trans-unit.source: In general, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> might not be raised when they are activated by the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> eventos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> não pode ser gerado quando são ativados por teclado.

trans-unit.source: In such cases, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate> events instead.
trans-unit.target: Nesses casos, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate> eventos em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> named `MenuStrip1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> chamado `MenuStrip1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate> evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.OnMenuActivate%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.OnMenuActivate%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.OnMenuActivate(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.OnMenuActivate(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.OnMenuActivate(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.OnMenuActivate(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.OnMenuDeactivate%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.OnMenuDeactivate%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.OnMenuDeactivate(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.OnMenuDeactivate(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.OnMenuDeactivate(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.OnMenuDeactivate(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passado por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela a ser processada.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> que representa a chave a ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o caractere foi processado pelo controle; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: for the immediate caller to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para o chamador imediato chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as Dicas de Ferramenta serão mostradas para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if ToolTips are shown for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as Dicas de Ferramentas forem mostradas para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property returns `false` by default because typically, ToolTips are not used for menus or menu items.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade retorna `false` por padrão porque, normalmente, as dicas de ferramenta não são usadas para menus ou itens de menu.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> stretches from end to end in its container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> se estende de ponta a ponta em seu contêiner.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> stretches from end to end in its container; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> estende de ponta a ponta de seu contêiner; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> do Windows a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method after getting filtered through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Todas as mensagens são enviadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> método após ser filtrado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> método corresponde exatamente ao Windows `WindowProc` função.

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o processamento de mensagens do Windows, consulte o `WindowProc` documentação de função na referência do SDK da plataforma Windows localizado na biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method to handle operating system messages identified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra substituindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> método para lidar com mensagens de sistema operacional identificadas no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem de sistema operacional WM_ACTIVATEAPP é tratada neste exemplo saber quando outro aplicativo está se torne ativo.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the Platform SDK documentation reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library to understand the available <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.LParam%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.WParam%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> values.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a referência de documentação do Platform SDK localizada na biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library entender disponíveis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.LParam%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.WParam%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> valores.

trans-unit.source: Actual constant values can be found in the windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available on MSDN.
trans-unit.target: Valores de constantes reais podem ser encontrados no arquivo de cabeçalho Windows. h incluído no download do SDK da plataforma (seção Core SDK), que também está disponível no MSDN.

trans-unit.source: for the immediate caller to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para o chamador imediato chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Inheriting controls should call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> method to process any messages that they do not handle.
trans-unit.target: Controles de herança deve chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> método para processar as mensagens que não lidar com eles.
